value.title: Automating complex deep learning model training using Amazon SageMaker Debugger and AWS Step Functions
value.excerpt: Amazon SageMaker Debugger can monitor ML model parameters, metrics, and computation resources as the model optimization is in progress. You can use it to identify issues during training, gain insights, and take actions like stopping the training or sending notifications through built-in or custom actions.
